content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) MOSCOW/LONDON  March 11 (Fitch) Deutsche Telekom's (DT) departure from its  self-funding strategy of T-Mobile US with debt that is non-recourse to the  parent  implies closer strategic and legal ties across the group  and reduces  headroom for additional leverage within DT's current rating of 'BBB+'  said  Fitch Ratings. Also  we believe this move may suggest a stronger appetite for  bidding in the forthcoming 600 MHz US spectrum auctio
name: T-Mobile US Inc
title: Fitch: T-Mobile US Loan Flags Risk to Deutsche Telekom Rating from US Spectrum

title: Analysis: T-Mobile could face crush of competition in crucial U.S. airwaves auction
